ygData.subject: RE: A little drum data
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t have any data past level 40 because I only recently made level 41 (now 43 - what a difference being out of a hell level makes).  Normally I test
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 6 Jan 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> actually i bet john kim knows at what points selo's becomes faster, whether
> based on level, percussion skill, or both. i am pretty sure level comes
> into it because a 50 bard is definitely faster than a 41 bard both with
> maxxed percussion.

I don't have any data past level 40 because I only recently
made level 41 (now 43 - what a difference being out of a hell
level makes). Normally I test every 5 levels, but since
there's some debate as to whether speed is level or skill
based, I'll probably test it before I hit 45.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
